Summary: HUGE FLASH of BRIGHT BLUE (ROYAL)/WHITE LIGHT
divs: Sighting DetailsMy family (husband, son & I) were driving home from celebrating Christmas with my in-laws (driving west on I-10) and suddenly, out in the distance, HIGH in the sky, a very WIDE range of the sky was lit up by a very BRIGHT blue light! It lasted about 3-5 seconds and then after a 3-5 second pause, it lit up again for about another 3-5 seconds. The skys were extremely CLEAR before and after the blue light. NO lightening storm, rain, etc. It was really strange. Immediately after the light flash my husband and I fell silent for a few seconds, as if to process it...then he yelled, "Whoa! Did you see that?!"...of course I had and answered, "Uh yea...what was it?!". We searched the sky for anything else unusual and found nothing??? Our 6 yr old son was asleep in the back seat and didn't witness it. We didn't see anything else unusual after that...but thought it was strange enough to mention to "someone"???
